channel.title: CVE Feed for opentext -- Operations Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for opentext -- Operations Agent

item.title: CVE-2024-0622|2024-08-01T18:11:35.641Z -- opentext -- operations%20agent
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability affects OpenText Operations Agent product versions 12.15 and 12.20-12.25 when installed on Non-Windows platforms. The vulnerability could allow local privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-0622|2024-02-20T15:50:33.307Z -- opentext -- operations%20agent
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability affects OpenText Operations Agent product versions 12.15 and 12.20-12.25 when installed on Non-Windows platforms. The vulnerability could allow local privilege escalation.
